Description: 
War Thunder - computer-multiplayer online game, dedicated combat aircraft, armored vehicles, and Navy during the Second World war and postwar period. The project is being developed and published by Gaijin Entertainment, known primarily for its racing game for PC and consoles. may 15, 2014 in open beta testing out ground equipment.

The game is dedicated combat aircraft, armored vehicles, and Navy during the Second World war. The user is invited to take part in the battles on all major hostilities, fighting with real players around the world. Great attention techniques, development of the player and its capabilities. There is a rare opportunity to test hundreds of aircraft models, to understand how flying real aircraft, and once inside detailed cabins, to be absorbed in the atmosphere of the battle. In addition, the game will be presented by a variety of terrestrial and marine technology - and it too can be managed.

A variety of PvP regimes large-scale battles
Configuration management, which provides the opportunity to play and have fun as beginners and experienced pilots, fighting together
PvE content as for single and joint network game: Dynamic campaign, a Separate mission, the mission Editor and other modes
A lot of detail recreated models of planes worked with cockpits, ships and tanks
Impressive graphics, authentic sounds and beautiful orchestral music.
